articles.title: Beverly Hills home that Pete Davidson hit with his car torn down - Daily Mail
articles.description: The two story Beverly Hills home has been pictured reduced to a pile of dirt. The home was formerly located just off Rodeo Drive, in The Flats part of the neighborhood.
